hackathon-description-text: First MLH - Partnered North American robotics hackathon

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team with the Best Use of AWS in their hack will receive Dell 1TB Portable hard drives!
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The first place team overall will win Dell Venue 10 Pro Tablets, Multimeters, Signed Matthew Mather book, and MLH First Place Medals
The second place team overall will win multimeters, Signed Matthew Mather book, and MLH Second Place Medals
The third place team overall will win multimeters, Signed Matthew Mather book, and MLH Third Place Medals

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Trottier Bldg, 3630 University St, Montreal, QC H3A 2B2, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Does it make your jaw drop?
Built from scratch, or using another project?
Does it work? Is it well designed?
